texts.MailSendingFailed: Mail sending failed, please check your email configuration and try again.
texts.TimezoneHelpText: This feature allows you to set a default time zone for your server, while users can select their own. If a user's time zone differs from the server's, all times will adjust accordingly. For example, with the server set to Europe/London(00:00) and a user in Europe/Paris(+01:00), times will be adjusted by 1 hour for that user. Selecting 'Default Timezone' will automatically use the server's or browser's time zone.
texts.Feature:SettingManagementEnableDescripti: Enable setting management system in the application.
